definition.description: An interface containing properties that are common to all license types

id.description: The unique identifier for the license. If this value is not available, you can contact Cato Support, who may be able to assist in retrieving it.
id.name: id

lastUpdated.description: The date of the last update to the license
lastUpdated.name: lastUpdated

definition.description: enum for license plan type (site license, service license, etc...)
definition.name: LicensePlan

enumValues.description: Cato Anti Malware Next Generation (legacy) service SKU
enumValues.name: CATO_ANTI_MALWARE_NG

enumValues.description: Cato Remote Browser Isolation (RBI) service SKU
enumValues.name: CATO_RBI

enumValues.description: Cato SAAS Security API with one application integration (legacy) service SKU
enumValues.name: CATO_SAAS_SECURITY_API_ONE_APP

enumValues.description: Cato SAAS Security API with two applications integration (legacy) service SKU
enumValues.name: CATO_SAAS_SECURITY_API_TWO_APPS

enumValues.description: Cato SAAS Security API with more than two Applications integration (legacy) service SKU
enumValues.name: CATO_SAAS_SECURITY_API_ALL_APPS

enumValues.description: Cato Advanced Threat Prevention service SKU
enumValues.name: CATO_THREAT_PREVENTION_ADV

definition.description: enum for account plan status – the current license status within the license lifecycle

enumValues.description: A license that is currently active
enumValues.name: ACTIVE

enumValues.description: An existing license with a future start date that is not currently active
enumValues.name: SCHEDULED

enumValues.description: A license that is active before its start date, for partners and customers to verify the relevant configurations
enumValues.name: STAGING

enumValues.description: A license in a grace period
enumValues.name: LOCKED

enumValues.description: An expired license is no longer active
enumValues.name: DISABLED

enumValues.description: The license is pending customer activation by setting a start date
enumValues.name: PENDING

definition.name: LicenseStatus
License
